title: Tanker Association representatives meet OGRA officials
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 24 (APP):Representatives of the Oil Tanker Association on Friday met with officials of the Oil and Gas Regulatory Authority (OGRA) to discuss issues related to the transition and transportation of petroleum products.

During the meeting, the Association highlighted various operational challenges and concerns being faced by the sector.

The OGRA officials assured that the matters raised would be examined in line with existing rules, regulations, and legal frameworks to ensure smooth and compliant operations.

Reaffirming its commitment to a fair and transparent petroleum supply chain, OGRA emphasised that it remains dedicated to maintaining regulated and efficient fuel transportation across the country, said a spokesman of the authority.
